Menu

To start

Wings
10 Dry-rubbed chicken tossed in your choice of sauce
Boneless Wings
10 Pieces of Southern fried chicken covered in your choice of sauce
Sauce
Crispy Korean, Buffalo, Mozambique, Alabama White BBQ, House BBQ

Greens

Baby Field Greens
Seasonal baby greens, sliced red onions, marble rye croutons, Dijon vinaigrette
Chomp Caesar
chopped romaine, chomp Caesar dressing, crispy fried shallots, parmesan peppercorn bacon bits, shaved parmesan, and garlic butter croutons
Chomp Wedge Salad
Baby iceberg, ranch, bacon, olive herb boursin cheese, fried onions, cherry peppers

Burgers

House Burger
Our signature burger, smoked gouda, bacon, Chomp sauce, lettuce, tomato, house pickles
The Smash Classic
Smashed beef patty, American cheese, house pickles, chopped white onion, Chomp sauce
Cheesy Fajita
Beef patty, pepper jack cheese, queso blanco, chorizo, peppers and onions, refried beans, pico de gallo, fritos

DINING AT CHOMP

We offer a variety of dining options at both Chomp locations.
In Warren, we have our front patio and spacious beer garden open in addition to indoor dining as well as our bar.
In Providence, we are happy to offer bar seating, indoor dining, as well as sidewalk seating.
Reservations are still being accepted but we keep tables available in both locations for walk-ins

The Chomp Burger Box

Having some friends over for the game this weekend and tired of the basic grocery store burger blend? Lucky for you we are now offering the Chomp Burger Box!
Ordering is available through our online store and can be picked up at either Chomp location or shipped Nationwide!
